<IC>

IIT was much=
 later, or perhaps much sooner, but Wheelie sat outside.

Looking up at the=
 heavens, or what they would be in several thousand years known.

His astro=
graphy program trying to map them, where they were now in relation to the p=
ast, where his programs of the future would tell him what was, what would b=
e.

Glancing up at the planet at the time known as Quintessa, where even no=
w he (or himself of the age) would be in hiding, fighting Sharkticons to st=
ay alive, Wheelie just remembered.

Thinking to that time however much late=
r, he just sat back, glancing at hte heavens.  The small Mini-Car, Autobot =
Survivor, watched up.  The past was changing.  Gazing at the moon, the smal=
l circle of debris still perhaps surrounding the planet from the aborted Vo=
k planetkiller..  Would the chnages they did here change his fate?  Would h=
e still meet Rodimus andm be rescued?  Or had things already gone beyond th=
at?
